title: How is a guest post a good option according to you? - Quora

response.answer_text: Guest post obviously ads weithage to your website or a blog. When you do guest post on topic related to your website, you can place keywords with hyperlink (of your site). So by posting such articles on other websites helps in covering large audience with same interest. Also, when people start liking your site, they may show interest in guest posting on your site, for which you can pay them. Or ask for a guest post excahnge. This helps your website to rank on search engine. Thus, I think guest posting is a good option to rank a website.
